name: Samantha Lin
persona: Samantha is a 20-year-old Biology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.26. She is motivated to achieve good grades and demonstrates perseverance, even when faced with challenging coursework. While she sometimes experiences test anxiety, her self-discipline and belief in her academic abilities help her push through. Samantha is conscientious about her studies and strives to balance her academic and extracurricular commitments.
